response.original_title: INAZMA DELIVERY: Bytheway’s Earth Exploration?! - Close Encounters of the Aurora
response.overview: A young alien named Bytheway arrives on Earth to see its legendary sharks. But just as he begins his exploration, all the city lights suddenly go out, and communication is lost!  In the southern sky, massive thunderclouds loom, while in the north, a mysterious red light flickers. What could be happening?
response.title: INAZMA DELIVERY: Bytheway’s Earth Exploration?! - Close Encounters of the Aurora
